creator: cmouse@desteem.org
text:
In some situations it would be handy to be able to say 'deny user/dn/whatever'
instead of just making complex require configurations.

creator: bnicholes@apache.org
text:
This has actually been fixed in trunk.  The new autorization syntax allows you 
to use 'reject user/dn/whatever'. Due to changes required, this functionality 
will likely not be backported to 2.2.
